price: 177. Then, when it descends in their courtyard (i.e. near to them), evil will be the morning for those who had been warned!
arabic: فَإِذَا نَزَلَ بِسَاحَتِهِمۡ فَسَآءَ صَبَاحُ ٱلۡمُنذَرِينَ
